剦字的基本解释

剦
yɑn
义未详。

剦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yān］
［《廣韻》央炎切，平鹽，影。］
［《廣韻》衣儉切，上琰，影。］
亦作“剦1”。“阉1”的繁体字。
(1)被阉割的人。指宫中守门的太监。后为太监的通称。
(2)阉割。
(3)掩闭；压抑。
(4)曲意逢迎。参见“閹然”。
(5)通“闔”。门扉。
(6)通“奄”。尽。
(7)通“奄”。气息微弱。参见“閹然”。

剦字的康熙字典解释
剦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
剦字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
yɑn
The meaning is unclear.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yān］
["Guangyun" Yang Yanqie, flat salt, shadow. ]
["Guangyun" Yijian cut, Shangyan, shadow. ]
Also known as "Yun 1". "阉1" in traditional characters.
(1) The castrated person. Refers to the eunuch who guards the gate in the palace. Later it was the general term for eunuch.
(2) Castration.
(3) Closure; repression.
(4) Quyi is welcome. See "Eunion".
(5) Through "close". Door door.
(6) Through "奄". Exhausted.
(7) Through "奄". The breath is weak. See "Eunion".
